channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Christina Trevanion heads to Peterborough for today's show. With the expert help of Roo Irvine and Stephanie Connell, the red and blue teams battle it out at the East of England Showground to see who can buy the most profitable three items to take to auction. Christina is given exclusive access to a rare and valuable collection belonging to a society established in 1710.
